pageContext.claim: “Baltimore’s numbers are the worst in the United States on Crime and the Economy. Billions of dollars have been pumped in over the years, but to no avail. The money was stolen or wasted. Ask Elijah Cummings where it went. He should investigate himself with his Oversight Committee!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump simply made up claims here. Records tracked by The Baltimore Sun show that over the past two years, city government got $380 million in federal aid — far less than $1 billion. Trump offered no evidence that any of the money has been “stolen or wasted."
